thread.title: Hai Zaroori Lyrics – Noor | Prakriti Kakar
thread.title_full: Hai Zaroori Lyrics – Noor | Prakriti Kakar

author: lyricsmint
title: Hai Zaroori Lyrics – Noor | Prakriti Kakar
text:
Jo hona tha hua wahi Badlana bhi hawaaon ka hai zaroori 
Kabhi kabhi lage yehi Jo milna tha mila wahi Bikharna bhi duaaon ka hai zaroori 
Kisi ke waaste kahaan Ye dooriyan rahi bas dooriyan 
Ke chori chori chupke se chupke se rona Hai zaroori.. Ke paani paani ankhiyon ka ankhiyon ka hona Hai zaroori.. 
Reh gayi aarzoo ik adhuri Ke kabhi kabhi Aisa bhi, aisa bhi hona Hai zaroori… 
Jo ye bhi na samjhe Waqt aane pe
